title: Takatak
plot: Level-headed and matured Kamaxi and her wild and impulsive younger sister Minaxi get into a roller-coaster ride as Kamaxi gets hitched to a porn addict and Minaxi ends up in the middle of a love triangle.
synopsis: "Takatak" is a desi quirky adult comedy film, whose story revolves around two sisters Kamaxi and Minaxi living inn a small village of Kolhapur. Kamaxi (Pranali Bhalerao) is a 24 year old girl who has done MA in literature (Marathi) and is very matured in nature. She gets married to a man 'Chandu' (Abhijit Amkar) (age 28) who is a govt employee. Chandu is a porn addict and is happy to marry Kamaxi as she has a beautiful body and he can now fulfill all his sexual fantasies with her, which he has developed while watching porns. Kamaxi on the other hand is expecting a cultured well-behaved and loving husband and gets disappointed after knowing the reality. Her younger sister 'Minaxi' (Ritika Shrotri) (age 18) is of totally different nature then her, she is wild and don't want to do the same mistake that her sister has done by getting married to a stranger. She has a childhood friend 'Ganya' (Prathamesh Parab) (age 21) who is also her neighbor. Ganya has been in love with Minaxi right from his childhood and has been proposing her from quite a while but Minaxi doesn't take him seriously. Minaxi is madly in love with Aditya (age 21) who is a Casanova of her college. Minaxi wants to run away with Aditya and get settled with him. The story from here revolves around the conflict that Kamaxi and Chandu find themselves in and Minaxi's biggest mistake, which has brought a tsunami in her life. What is the mistake, what happens to Ganya's one sided love story and what happens with the conflict between Kamaxi and her porn addict husband is what you have to watch the movie for.
